issues.message: Use 'Akka.Actor.ICanTell' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.

Use 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<string, string[]>>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string, string[]>'.
Use 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<T>' here; it is a more general type than 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<T>'.
Use 'Akka.Persistence.IWithPersistenceId' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Persistence.Journal.AsyncWriteTarget.ReadHighestSequenceNr'.
Use 'Akka.Persistence.IPersistentRepresentation' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Persistence.Persistent'.
Use 'Akka.Tools.MatchHandler.MatchBuilder<object>' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Tools.MatchHandler.MatchBuilder'.
Use 'System.IO.Stream' here; it is a more general type than 'System.IO.MemoryStream'.
Use 'System.IO.Stream' here; it is a more general type than 'System.IO.MemoryStream'.
Use 'System.IO.FileSystemInfo' here; it is a more general type than 'System.IO.FileInfo'.
